issue.title: mkvcinemas.kim

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.9.23

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://mkvcinemas.kim/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

can't use Dropdown menu or search button without disabling AdGuard base

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: 4chan.org

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads)
[NSFW] [http://4chan.org](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2F4chan.org)
### Comment
> I am using Adguard DNS (https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query) from chome "use secure DNS" option. Usually I don't see ad on this website but now I get this ad. 
> 
> link of the image used in this ad: https://creatives.cdnbo.org/vmrj7WC-1d99fcf3a19b4243588c3508afb47418a4e6ccfc.jpg
> 
> Where it takes when clicked on the image: https://hakurei.cdnbo.org/gate?r=WhOmUsSPLc&d=27&dest=aiuncensored.info&p=pol 
> 
> which later redirects to another Website. 
> 
> I guess blocking https://creatives.cdnbo.org/ and https://hakurei.cdnbo.org/ should get the job done. 
> 
> Maybe block https://cdnbo.org/ as a whole. It seems like an website dedicated to ads.
Username: `@nimon30`

### [NSFW] Screenshots
  [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/l7kp8go9yyo4wwcgco480k44g4sossn1d9r0sghwgg.png?nc=1)

### System configuration

Information | Value
--- | ---
AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS
DNS setup: | Device or router settings
DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Default server
System version: | Android
Browser: | Chrome

comment.body: I first tested with secure DNS like you, and as I couldn't reproduce, debugged on PC.

issue.title: chatgpt.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://chatgpt.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fchatgpt.com%2F) ### Comment > ### Bug Report: Sora and Project Folders Disappear When Enabling "Filter HTTPS" in AdGuard > > #### Description > When enabling the **"Filter HTTPS"** option in **Network settings** of AdGuard, the **Sora and Project folders** disappear. This issue occurs consistently when the setting is turned on. > > #### Steps to Reproduce > 1. Open **AdGuard** and go to **Settings**. > 2. Navigate to the **Network** section. > 3. Enable the **"Filter HTTPS"** option. > 4. Observe that the **Sora and Project folders** disappear. > > #### Expected Behavior > The Sora and Project folders should remain visible and accessible even when **"Filter HTTPS"** is enabled. > > #### Actual Behavior > As soon as **"Filter HTTPS"** is enabled, the folders disappear. > > #### Additional Information > - **OS Version**: Win 11 pro Build 26100.3476 > - **AdGuard Version**: 7.20.2 (4988) > > #### Workaround > Disabling **"Filter HTTPS"** restores the Sora and Project folders, but this is not an ideal solution as HTTPS filtering is needed. > Additionally, adding **chatgpt.com** to the **User Filter** does not resolve the issue. > > > Username: `@AbhishekBasnet` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/56xx3klcg6g4sskwwk0g4kckokwc84cbx8k56apl3s.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/cbyjmyqfh14wgkk0owsg48wk8kcsw44qw02e3hnmfk.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.20.2 (4988) System version: | Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.26100.0 Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | TDI Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base Custom filters: | User rules (url: none) Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | disabled Userstyles: | disabled Other extensions used: | Glasswire ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.custom_bootstrap=&dns.custom_fallback=&dns.custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.enabled=false&dns.fallback_mode=System&dns.filters=1&dns.servers=System&dns.timeout=0&extensions=AdGuard%2520Assistant%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fassistant%2F4.3%2Fassistant.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=2&license_type=paid&product_type=Win&product_version=7.20.2+%284988%29&referrer=&scheme_version=2&stealth.enabled=false&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.26100.0&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Windows+NT+10.0%3B+Win64%3B+x64%29+AppleWebKit%2F537.36+%28KHTML%2C+like+Gecko%29+Chrome%2F134.0.0.0+Safari%2F537.36&utm_campaign=report&utm_medium=assistant&utm_source=win&win.wfp=false)
